data:
'this bank u?                         '  --->  (classified as: OUT OF CONTEXT)
'is bot awake or sleep now?           '  --->  (classified as: OUT OF CONTEXT)
'howdy do u talks?                    '  --->  (classified as: OUT OF CONTEXT)

'i need new pasword can you fix this                        '  --->  (classified as: GET PASSWORD)
'I try login but keep asking new password, but when I enter stuff it just go back and tells me try again, can you do the steps with me and tell what I really need put in there? '  --->  (classified as: GET PASSWORD)
'Hey, it wont let me in unless I do password again and honestly I donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t remember how I set up, can you like walk me through what I supposed to do, maybe IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m missing something? '  --->  (classified as: GET PASSWORD)

'It would really help if you could break down, in plain language and lots of detail, every part of whatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s needed for applicants like me, including papers, forms, approvals, and expected waiting times. '  --->  (classified as: APPLY FOR MORTGAGE)
'Is loan getting very hard?                                 '  --->  (classified as: OUT OF CONTEXT)
'my old job never gave me papers before so if bank asks me for employment stuff, is it ok if i just tell them where i work or do i needs to show like something official to apply    '  --->  (classified as: OUT OF CONTEXT)

'Make a payment to a utility bill.                      '  --->  (classified as: OUT OF CONTEXT)
'Transfer cash me not know how you can?                  '  --->  (classified as: OUT OF CONTEXT)
'I try to transfer it yesterday but the thing it say error so IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m not sure I finish, maybe you can look and see if cash go from me or no? '  --->  (classified as: CHECK RECENT TRANSACTIONS)

'My card not working, how I make it go?                     '  --->  (classified as: CARD DETAILS)
'Help me set up card to spending, is not start.             '  --->  (classified as: CARD DETAILS)
'I want to cancel the home loan application.                     '  --->  (classified as: CANCEL LOAN)
'Tell me about the fees for closing an account.                '  --->  (classified as: CHECK FEES)
'ATM keeped my card, need talk to someone for help.            '  --->  (classified as: HUMAN AGENT)
'So how you help me, like, applying for new loan cause I need somewhere live but don't got any knowledge that much for borrowing for house. '  --->  (classified as: APPLY FOR LOAN)
'Find ATM what take my card, I losted my other.         '  --->  (classified as: RECOVER SWALLOWED CARD)

'I was just tryna remember if thereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s any charges or whatever, on my card but like I didnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t get all the notifications, so can you tell me whatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s up?     '  --->  (classified as: CHECK FEES)

'Can you review all my registered cards and provide the available balances for each, but most importantly, I am interested in the detailed balance of my primary card at this moment? '  --->  (classified as: CARD DETAILS)
'Tell me about my prepaid card balance and stuff.        '  --->  (classified as: CHECK CURRENT BALANCE ON CARD)
